name: Volun's Tale
description:
Project is Work in Progress.

Volun's Tale is a 3rd Person Action RPG Game that takes place in a fantasy land called Winterfield.

Settings:

One night, your village is attacked and infiltrated with enemies when everyone is celebrating the recent victory of skirmish. Everyone was captured and brought to the enemy’s territory while you, however, have escaped. Knowing the enemy’s leader is in your village you decided to go back and defeat him.

Moment to moment gameplay:

You will encounter diverse types of enemies along the way to the boss. To become stronger, you must find weapons and armor which are allocated in different areas, levelling up yourself by defeating enemies and searching for secrets to have acquire extra buffs and protection.

Fun Factor:

  1. Fun and fair to fight enemies.
  2. Lite elemental system along with character progression.
  3. Three types of weapon class with each one offering different combat style.

Approximate length: (From beginning to the boss)

30mins to 1hr.

Feature to include on next patch:

Music and Audio.
